00016 class member_iterator

00018 public:
00019 
00020         typedef std::bidirectional_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00021         typedef member value_type;
00022         typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00023         typedef member* pointer;
00024         typedef member& reference;
00025 
00026         member_iterator(const member_iterator& other)
00027                 : m_type(other.m_type)
00028                 , m_pos(other.m_pos)
00029                 , m_offset(other.m_offset)
00030         { }
00031 
00032         member_iterator& operator=(const member_iterator& rhs)
00033         {
00034                 m_type = rhs.m_type;
00035                 m_pos = rhs.m_pos;
00036                 m_offset = rhs.m_offset;
00037                 return *this;
00038         }
00039 
00040         const user_type& get_type() const { return *m_type; }
00041 
00042         template<class T>
00043         bool is() const { return (*this)->get_type() == T::member_id; }
00044 
00045         template<class T>
00046         T get() const
00047         {
00048                 member* mem = m_type->_get_member(m_pos);
00049                 ASSERT_STRICT(mem->get_type() == T::member_id);
00050                 return T(*static_cast<T::member_type*>(mem), m_offset);         
00051         }
00052 
00053         member& operator*() const { return *m_type->_get_member(m_pos); }
00054 
00055         member* operator->() const { return m_type->_get_member(m_pos); }
00056 
00057         bool operator==(const member_iterator& rhs) const { return (m_type == rhs.m_type && m_pos == rhs.m_pos); }
00058 
00059         bool operator!=(const member_iterator& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00060 
00061         bool operator<(const member_iterator& rhs) const { return m_pos < rhs.m_pos; }
00062 
00063         member_iterator& operator++()
00064         {
00065                 ASSERT_STRICT(m_pos != m_type->_member_count());
00066                 ++m_pos;
00067                 return *this;
00068         }
00069 
00070         member_iterator operator++(int)
00071         {
00072                 member_iterator ret(*this);
00073                 ++*this;
00074                 return ret;
00075         }
00076 
00077         member_iterator& operator--()
00078         {
00079                 ASSERT_STRICT(m_pos != 0);
00080                 --m_pos;
00081                 return *this;
00082         }
00083 
00084         member_iterator operator--(int)
00085         {
00086                 member_iterator ret(*this);
00087                 --*this;
00088                 return ret;
00089         }

00094                 : m_type(&t)
00095                 , m_pos(pos)
